If anyone's having a problem where Episode 3 appears as Coming Soon even after you copied the folder, do the following:
Make sure Ep1's folder is called default, Ep2's called WalkingDead102, and Ep3's called WalkingDead103.
If it still appears as Coming Soon, move away the file called "0_99_patch_02_05.ttarch" from the folder. (Do not delete it, in case this fix doesn't work)

PS, if you guys get a black screen and some noises, it's probably because you replaced existing episode files by the new ones. You need to put the files in a new folder, DO NOT APPLY THE FILES AS IF THEY WERE A CRACK.

@riverfront12: I have not tried with Reloaded release of the game but it should not be any problem. Try download this and test, and place the walkingdead103 folder in the Pack folder where you installed the game.
Well, this torrent worked fine... after it crashed once and deleted my save files. Oh well, not a big loss I guess... but I suggest backing up your save files before you try to play...

Okay folks. It's official. This one works with the one uploaded by RELOADED (parts 1 and 2 of the game). Just copy the walkingdead103 folder to your pack folder where you installed the game. Enjoy!

I had a lot of problems because I had TWO separate installs from grabbing Ep1 from RELOADED and the Ep1/Ep2 combo from REVOLT. What I finally realized is that I'm not nearly as broke as when Ep1 came out, I've enjoyed these games so far, and they're cheap. So, I'm just going to pony up on Steam. 

FYI, REVOLT created a new install in Program Files (x86) /Games /The Walking Dead, where I was trying to install this to Program Files (x86) /The Walking Dead, which only had Ep1.
